channel.title: Quick and easy help will rep++
channel.description: Hey guys I have never done this before lol and I know I must be a noob to not know how but how would i make a command that does an emote like say i made an command called ::dance and then he does the dance emote how would I make it what code would i use will rep++

will make it for you.

item.title: Quick and easy help will rep++
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

PI Servers:


			if (playerCommand.startsWith("dance") && c.playerRights >= 3) {
				c.startAnimation(Dance ID number here);
				c.getPA().requestUpdates();
			}

Delta Servers (Not 100% sure):


if (command.startsWith("dance") && playerRights >= 3)
	{
		pEmote = dance ID here;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		}
	}

Read full topic
